dailyPosts.title: Angular NgRx Tutorial | Episode 5 | Creating an NgRx Effect and calling the service within it
dailyPosts.description: Watch this video if you want to integrate the Effects Module and call all your services from the Effects. We will also see what the dependencies are for an effect to be used in NgRx app while going over the syntax to write an effect.

dailyPosts.title: Internationalize your Angular applications using ngx-translate
dailyPosts.description:
Internationalization is a process that occurs when a firm decides to expand into new territories, which may or may not utilize the same language as its original applications.

ngx-translate is an Angular internationalization library that allows you to set translations for your visible content across many languages and simply switch between them.

dailyPosts.title: Call by Value and Call by Reference in Angular
dailyPosts.description: In this article, we'll quickly understand the popular concept of Call by value and Call by reference in JavaScript. Then, we'll understand this concept in the Angular framework by doing an exercise.

dailyPosts.description: I am writing this part, knowing there will be an IV, because I am drifting away, experimenting more features. So let's work backwards and see how the end result should look like.

dailyPosts.title: Getting into software testing with Jest
dailyPosts.description: Starting from open-source projects to enterprise software, most softwares have a huge codebase. Don't believe me? Here is a fact! Some of the Google codebases have over 2 billion lines! Understanding and debugging each line manually is something that probably only Superman can do. So when contributing to a project, it is essential to keep in mind that your code doesn't disrupt the existing functionalities.

dailyPosts.title: Creating a dynamic component is now easier: changes in Angular 13
dailyPosts.description: ...Here's where Angular can help us; it can create components at runtime and render them using a createComponent method of the ViewContainerRef. But the API of this method has changed in version 13 of the framework. From this article, you will learn how the process of dynamic component creation looks now.

dailyPosts.title: RxJs finalize operator explained
dailyPosts.description: The finalize operator is a very handy operator to perform side effects or tear-down logic. Learn how to use it and apply it in your project.

dailyPosts.title: Difference Between Subject and BehaviorSubject
dailyPosts.description: Difference between Subject and BehaviorSubject is yet another favorite question asked by interviewers and we often fail to answer the main difference. We say that they are same except BehaviorSubject can emit some initial value whereas Subject can't. We think we are done but in fact we dimmed our chances of getting through the interview. So let's unravel the mystery!
